title: Employer Not Paying Salary or Wages
description: When your employer refuses to pay your salary, wages, or withholds payment without valid reason

rights.title: Right to Timely Payment of Wages
rights.description: Every employee has the legal right to receive their wages on time as per the agreement

actionSteps.title: Document the Issue
actionSteps.description: Keep records of unpaid salary periods, employment contract, and communication with employer

actionSteps.title: Send Written Notice
actionSteps.description: Send a formal written notice to employer demanding payment of due wages

actionSteps.title: File Complaint with Labour Authority
actionSteps.description: If employer doesn't respond, file complaint with appropriate labour authority

variations: My company is not paying salary
Employer refusing to pay due amount
Company not giving salary on time
